title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets: Fighter Jets Target Terrorist Infrastructure in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Fighter jets attacked a series of targets belonging to the terrorist organization Hezbollah throughout the day in Lebanese territory. Among the targets that were hit are several terrorist infrastructures in the areas of A-Nakura and Al-Metmura, military structures in the Ayta Ash-Shab area, and a observation post in the Al-Khiyam area.

Additionally, IDF forces carried out artillery fire to remove threats in the areas of Khalta, Hamoul, Hula, Al-Jibin, and Marwahin in southern Lebanon.

Further to the announcement made earlier today regarding the launches that fell in the Hurfeish area, this involved two explosive drones that crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in the Hurfeish area. The incident is under investigation.

Attached is documentation from the strikes: https://bit.ly/4ebuw4o
